text: Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000 is a 1999 direct-to-video movie that is based upon Chuck E. Cheese. It was released October 5, 1999 in CEC restaurants and Target stores.Chuck E. Cheese licensed items The plot is that a boy named Charlie Rockit needs $50,000 to fix his aunt and uncle's tractor engine, so Chuck E. Cheese and his friends go to the Galaxy 5000 to win it in a race.Complete film on YouTube ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000 at Toonarific.com Category:American comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:1999 comedy movies
title: Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000
